data.title: C Link to C Main Flashpoint + Aftershock to Delay C Site Push
data.description: Use this Flashpoint and / or Aftershock when rotating to C to catch enemy players pushing through C Main off guard and support your team.

data.title: Early Round A Main Fault Line from A Link to Contest Space
data.description: Use this early round A Main Fault Line from A Link to help your team to contest A Main. You can also wait for enemy players to make noise or for information from your team to use your stun.

data.title: A Site Spike Plant Delay Aftershock
data.description: Use this A Site Spike Plant Delay Aftershock to force enemy players to either way to plant the spike, or place it in a non-ideal location.

data.title: Early Round B Main Fault Line to Deny Space
data.description: Use this early round B Main Fault Line to make it more difficult for the Attackers to take space in B Main.
